mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(cashbook_date, '%Y.%m') AS "날짜" ,SUM((case when cashbook_kind = '수입' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END)) AS "수입" ,SUM((case when cashbook_kind = '지출' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END)) AS "지출" ,SUM((case when cashbook_kind = '수입' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END) -(case when cashbook_kind = '지출' then cashbook_price ELSE 0 END)) AS "합계" FROM cashbook GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(cashbook_date, '%Y.%m') ORDER BY cashbook_date desc LIMIT 0, 3;

SELECT cashbook_kind as cashbookKind, sum(cashbook_price) as cashbookPrice, DAY(cashbook_date) as dDay FROM cashbook WHERE YEAR(cashbook_date) = #{currentYear} AND MONTH(cashbook_date) = #{currentMonth} GROUP BY DAY(cashbook_date), cashbook_kind

SELECT cashbook_id as cashbookId, cashbook_kind as cashbookKind, category_name as categoryName, cashbook_price as cashbookPrice, cashbook_content as cashbookContent, cashbook_date as cashbookDate FROM cashbook WHERE cashbook_id = #{cashbookId}
mapper.insert: insert into cashbook ( cashbook_kind, category_name, cashbook_price, cashbook_content, cashbook_date, create_date, update_date ) values ( #{cashbookKind}, #{categoryName}, #{cashbookPrice}, #{cashbookContent}, #{cashbookDate}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update cashbook set cashbook_kind = #{cashbookKind}, category_name = #{categoryName}, cashbook_price = #{cashbookPrice}, cashbook_content = #{cashbookContent}, update_date = now() where cashbook_id = #{cashbookId}
